title: Aerial War Over Ukraine Heats Up as Russia Pounds Cities
description: Ukraine, beefing up its air defenses, says Russia has bought ballistic missiles from Iran to replace the precision weapons it is firing at services vital to civilians.
dc:creator: Marc Santora, Shashank Bengali and Andrew E. Kramer
media:credit: Bulent Kilic/Agence France-Presse â€” Getty Images
media:description: A Ukrainian artillery unit outside Bakhmut on Tuesday. After the Russian offensive slowed into a grinding strategy of shelling cities and towns, the Ukrainians needed more and better artillery. Now it is air defenses.
